alert.note: Alert for Garden; Sheridan (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 06 at 3:14AM CDT by NWS NorthPlatte
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Garden and southern Sheridan Counties through 245 AM MDT... At 214 AM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 8 miles southeast of Alliance Airport, or 13 miles southeast of Alliance, moving southeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Crescent Lake National Wildlife Refuge, Richardson Lake, Miles Lake, Mumper, Herman Lake, Jerry Lake, Deer Lake, Britton Lake, Wild Horse Flats, Tralnor Lake and Kincaid Lake. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
